gets a specific generation by id/hash for the given user.

delete.description:
Deletes the generation object from db

    HTTPException: 404 if generation id is not found in the db

Returns:
    Object: Deleted true with 204 status code

get.description:
Find all scenario sets based on either the project id or the scenario id

Returns:
    a list of scenario sets (project id) or a list of scenarios (scenario id)

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set

parameters.name: scenario_id

schema.title: Response Get Scenario Sets V0 Scenario Sets Get

post.description:
Triggers a generation of a test scenario set, could be long running.
This scenario set can now be used for testing on a model.

Returns:
    Object: generation result with '201 Created' status code on success.

put.description:
Update a Scenario Set

Returns:
    the updated Scenario Set

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set to modify

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set to modify

parameters.name: scenario_id

post.description:
Upload new scenarios

Returns:
    the Scenario Set with the uploaded scenarios

post.description:
Triggers a generation of a scenario set based on source scenario ID, could be long running.
A registered model can now use this scenario set for testing.

Returns:
    Object: generation result with '201 Created' status code on success.

get.description:
Get a Test Run

    the Test Run

Update a Test Run
Returns:
    the updated Test Run

schema.title: Test Run Id
schema.description: The ID of the test run to modify

parameters.name: test_run_id

post.description:
Runs tests on a model (mut_id) using previously generated scenario.
Feeds the scenario data (scenario_id) into the model and evaulates results
depending on the test type specified.

Returns:
    The test run data which includes the evaluated metrics from the run.

Add a test run metric

Returns:
    The persisted test run metric item

tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter projects in the Okareo app

seed_data.title: Seed Data
seed_data.description: Seed data is a list of dictionaries, each with an input and result

generation_type.description:
Type of generation. Current supported scenario types are:
Seed: Seed data for a scenario set
Rephrase invariant: Results will be rephrased versions of inputs
Conditional: Results will be rephrased inputs represented in a conditional format
Text reverse question: The result will be the target question for the input
Text reverse label: The result will be the intent of the target question for the input

source_scenario_id.title: Source Scenario Id
source_scenario_id.description: ID for the scenario set that the generated scenario set will use as a source

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the generated scenario set

number_examples.title: Number Examples
number_examples.description: Number of examples to be generated for the scenario set

generation_type.description:
Type of generation. Current supported scenario types are:
Seed: Seed data for a scenario set
Rephrase invariant: Results will be rephrased versions of inputs
Conditional: Results will be rephrased inputs represented in a conditional format
Text reverse question: The result will be the target question for the input
Text reverse label: The result will be the intent of the target question for the input
